channel.title: Dream Chaser Show
channel.description:
Are you one of the 7 biilion people in the world who knows you're not achieving your full potential? In 2012 anything is possible, everybodys' dream chasing.
A recent poll taken indicated that only 5% of the population feels like they are using their talents and abilities to their full potential.
The Dream Chaser show is dedicated to providing inspiration to regular people who desire to do big things.
I'll be sharing my knowledge as well as interviewing everyday people who are living the life of their dreams. Tune in at: http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Live BIG, Dream BIG
channel.itunes:author: Will Lane
channel.itunes:summary:
Are you one of the 7 biilion people in the world who knows you're not achieving your full potential? In 2012 anything is possible, everybodys' dream chasing.
A recent poll taken indicated that only 5% of the population feels like they are using their talents and abilities to their full potential.
The Dream Chaser show is dedicated to providing inspiration to regular people who desire to do big things.
I'll be sharing my knowledge as well as interviewing everyday people who are living the life of their dreams. Tune in at: http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com

item.title: Episode 7: From Prison Bars To Bentley Cars - The Wes Smith Interview
item.description: In this episode Will interviews successful 32 year old entrepreneur Wes Smith. Wes was sent to prison at age 19 for armed robbery and served a 10 year sentence. After serving a lengthy sentence of 10 years Wes was released and within a 3 year period of his release grossed over $2 million. Wes is going to tell his amazing story and share the secret formula that allowed him to beat the odds and achieve success.
item.dc:creator: Will Lane
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Episode 6: No Mojo? 5 Keys To Staying Motivated
item.description: Are you excited about tomorrow? If not, in this episode Will is going to be discussing 5 keys to staying motivated and inspired. Consistent motivation is the key to pushing through barriers of resistance. http://dreamchasershow.com http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com

item.title: Episode 5: 3 Habits That Will Keep You Stuck
item.description: There are 3 characteristics of every person who consistently struggles in entrepreneurship, life and the money game. http://dreamchasershow.com http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com

item.title: Episode 4: Taking Risks Is Necessary To Win
item.description: In this episode Will explains why taking risks in life is not only recommended by necessary. Many of us play too small to win, tune in to find out why. Listen now. http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com http://dreamchasershow.com

item.title: Episode 3: You can't live until you get here
item.description: Are you really here or are you over there? Is your life taking place today, yesterday or tomorrow? This week's show looks at the topic of awareness. How many of us are here right now? http://dreamchasershow.com http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com
item.dc:creator: Will Lane

item.title: Episode 2 - We Can Learn Alot About Success From Floyd Maywheather
item.description: Love him or hate him Floyd Maywheather is the best boxer ever. In this show I'm going to break down what makes him great and how you can apply his same principles to make you great. http://dreamchasershow.podomatic.com http://dreamchasershow.com

item.title: Episode 1: The Real Meaning of Commitment
item.description: What is commitment? Does it still exist today. Will shares his views on the topic of commitment and what it really means to be committed with purpose.
item.dc:creator: Will Lane
item.itunes:summary: What is commitment? Does it still exist today. Will shares his views on the topic of commitment and what it really means to be committed with purpose.
